spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.description: You create an Invisible, magical eye within range that hovers in the air for the duration. You mentally receive visual information from the eye, which can look in every direction. The eye can't enter another plane of existence.

spells.name: Aura of Life
spells.description: An aura radiates from you in a 30-foot Emanation for the duration. Any nonhostile creature in the aura (including you) can't have its Hit Point maximum reduced and has Resistance to Necrotic damage. Also, a nonhostile living creature regains 1 Hit Point when it starts its turn in the aura with 0 Hit Points.

spells.name: Aura of Purity
spells.description: An aura radiates from you in a 30-foot Emanation for the duration. Any ally in the aura (including you) can't be Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Stunned, and has Advantage on saves against conditions that cause those effects.

spells.name: Banishment
spells.material: an item the target finds distasteful
spells.description: One creature you can see within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be transported to a harmless demiplane. The target is Incapacitated while there. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space. If the target is native to a different plane, the target doesn't return.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Blight
spells.description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. This spell has no effect on Constructs or Undead. Plant creatures have Disadvantage on the save and take maximum damage.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Charm Monster
spells.description: You attempt to charm a creature you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with Advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. On a failed save, it has the Charmed condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Compulsion
spells.description: Each creature of your choice that you can see within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature has the Charmed condition for the duration. While Charmed, a creature can't take Reactions and must use as much of its movement as possible to move in a direction you choose on each of its turns.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.description: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Confused condition until the spell ends. A Confused creature rolls d10 at the start of each turn to determine behavior.
spells.at_higher_levels: The Sphere's radius increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Conjure Minor Elementals
spells.description: You conjure spirits from the Elemental Planes that flit around you. Until the spell ends, any attack you make deals an extra 2d8 damage when you hit a creature within 15 feet. This damage is Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning (your choice when you cast the spell).
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 2d8 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Conjure Woodland Beings
spells.description: You conjure nature spirits that flit around you. Until the spell ends, each creature you choose that enters the Emanation for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Wisdom saving throw, taking 5d8 Force damage on a failed save or half on a success.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Control Water
spells.material: a drop of water and a pinch of dust
spells.description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a Cube up to 100 feet on a side. Choose one of the following effects: Flood, Part Water, Redirect Flow, or Whirlpool.

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.description: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 Hit Points before the spell ends, the target drops to 1 Hit Point instead, and the spell ends. If the spell is still in effect when the target is subjected to an effect that would kill it instantaneously without dealing damage, that effect is negated against the target, and the spell ends.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, visualize, or describe by distance and direction. You can bring along objects as long as their weight doesn't exceed what you can carry. You can also bring one willing creature of your size or smaller.

spells.name: Divination
spells.material: incense worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: Your magic and an offering put you in contact with a god or a god's servants. You ask one question about a specific goal, event, or activity to occur within 7 days. The DM offers a truthful reply, which might be a short phrase, a cryptic rhyme, or an omen.

spells.name: Dominate Beast
spells.description: One Beast you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration. While it's Charmed, you have a telepathic link with it. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to it as a Bonus Action.
spells.at_higher_levels: 5th level: 10 minutes. 6th level: 1 hour. 7th level or higher: 8 hours.

spells.name: Elemental Bane
spells.description: Choose one creature you can see within range, and choose one of these damage types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be affected by the spell. The first time each turn the affected target takes damage of the chosen type, it takes an extra 2d6 damage of that type.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
spells.material: a piece of tentacle from a giant octopus or a giant squid
spells.description: Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. When a creature enters the affected area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 Bludgeoning damage and have the Restrained condition until the spell ends.

spells.name: Fabricate
spells.description: You convert raw materials into products of the same material. For example, you can fabricate a wooden bridge from trees, rope from hemp, and clothes from flax or wool. You can fabricate a Large or smaller object in a 10-foot Cube or eight connected 5-foot Cubes.

spells.name: Faithful Hound
spells.description: You conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that you can see within range, where it remains for the duration. The hound is invisible to all creatures except you. If any creature enters the warded area, the hound starts barking loudly. The hound sees invisible creatures and can see into the Ethereal Plane.

spells.name: Find Greater Steed
spells.description: You summon a spirit that assumes the form of an Otherworldly Steed. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the steed takes a form you choose: Griffon, Pegasus, Peryton, Dire Wolf, Rhinoceros, or Saber-Toothed Tiger. The steed has the statistics of the chosen form but is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice).

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.material: a bit of phosphorus or a firefly
spells.description: Flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet. Choose Warm Shield or Chill Shield. Warm Shield grants Resistance to Cold damage. Chill Shield grants Resistance to Fire damage. Whenever a creature hits you with a melee attack while within 5 feet of you, the shield erupts with flame. The attacker takes 2d8 Fire damage from Warm Shield, or 2d8 Cold damage from Chill Shield.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by Difficult Terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target's Speed nor cause the target to have the Paralyzed or Restrained condition. The target can also spend 5 feet of movement to automatically escape from nonmagical restraints.

spells.name: Giant Insect
spells.description: You summon a giant centipede, spider, wasp, or scorpion, which appears in an unoccupied space within range. The creature uses the Giant Insect stat block and is an ally to you and your allies. In combat, it shares your Initiative count but takes its turn immediately after yours.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 4th, AC increases by 1, Hit Points by 10, attack bonus by 1, and damage by 2.

spells.name: Grasping Vine
spells.description: You conjure a vine that sprouts from a surface within range. When you cast this spell, you can direct the vine to lash out at a creature within 30 feet of it. That creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet toward the vine. Until the spell ends, you can direct the vine to lash out at the same creature or another one as a Bonus Action on each of your turns.

spells.name: Greater Invisibility
spells.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is also Invisible as long as it is on the target's person.

spells.name: Guardian of Faith
spells.description: A Large spectral guardian appears and hovers in an unoccupied space within range. The guardian occupies that space and is Incorporeal. Any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, taking 20 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much on a success. The guardian vanishes when it has dealt a total of 60 damage.

spells.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
spells.description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot Cube within range look, sound, and smell like another sort of natural terrain. A field or road can be made to resemble a swamp, hill, crevasse, or some other difficult or impassable terrain. The tactile characteristics of the terrain are unchanged.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the Cylinder makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 Bludgeoning damage and 4d6 Cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Hailstones turn the storm's area of effect into Difficult Terrain until the end of your next turn.
spells.at_higher_levels: The Bludgeoning damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Leomund's Secret Chest
spells.material: a chest (3x2x2 feet) and a Tiny replica, both worth 5,000+ GP total
spells.description: You hide a chest, and all its contents, on the Ethereal Plane. While holding the Tiny replica, you can summon the chest as a Magic action. The chest can contain up to 12 cubic feet of nonliving material.

spells.name: Locate Creature
spells.description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature's location if that creature is within 1,000 feet of you. If the creature is moving, you know the direction of its movement. The spell can't locate a creature if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the creature.

spells.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
spells.description: You conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that you can see within range, where it remains for the duration. Only you can see the hound. If any creature enters the warded area, the hound starts barking. The hound has Truesight with a range of 60 feet.

spells.name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
spells.description: You make an area within range magically secure. The area is a Cube that can be as small as 5 feet to as large as 100 feet on each side. Choose how the security manifests: sounds blocked, vision blocked, divination blocked, or planar travel blocked.
spells.at_higher_levels: The Cube can be up to 100 feet larger for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
spells.description: A shimmering Sphere of force encloses a Large or smaller creature or object within range. An unwilling creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or be enclosed for the duration. Nothing can pass through the Sphere, and it is immune to all damage. The creature inside can't be damaged or affected by anything outside.

spells.name: Phantasmal Killer
spells.description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d10 Psychic damage and has the Frightened condition. At the end of each of the target's turns, the target repeats the save, taking 4d10 Psychic damage on a failed save.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.description: You attempt to transform a creature within range into a Beast. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (an unwilling target succeeds automatically if it has more Hit Points than the spell slot used allows). On a failed save, the target assumes the form of a Beast whose Challenge Rating equals or is less than the target's level or Challenge Rating.
spells.notes_2024: 2024 version ties transformation success to Hit Points vs spell slot level.

spells.name: Raulothim's Psychic Lance
spells.description: You unleash a shimmering lance of psychic power from your forehead at a creature you can see within range. Alternatively, you can utter a creature's name instead of targeting it directly. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 7d6 Psychic damage and have the Incapacitated condition until the start of your next turn.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Shadow of Moil
spells.material: an undead eyeball encased in a gem worth 150+ GP
spells.description: Flame-like shadows wreathe your body until the spell ends. You gain the following benefits: You are Heavily Obscured. You have Resistance to Radiant damage. Dim Light fills a 10-foot Emanation around you. Whenever a creature within the Emanation hits you with an attack roll, that creature takes 2d8 Necrotic damage.

spells.name: Sickening Radiance
spells.description: Dim greenish light spreads within a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range. The light spreads around corners and remains until the spell ends. A creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 4d10 Radiant damage on a failed save or half on a success. A creature that fails the save also gains one level of Exhaustion.

spells.name: Staggering Smite
spells.casting_time: Bonus Action, after hitting with a melee weapon
spells.description: Your strike staggers the target. The target takes an extra 4d6 Psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take Reactions until the end of its next turn.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Stone Shape
spells.description: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape. You could shape a stone door or block the door with stone.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.material: diamond dust worth 100+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

spells.name: Storm Sphere
spells.description: A 20-foot-radius Sphere of whirling air springs into existence centered on a point you choose within range. The Sphere is Difficult Terrain. A creature that enters the Sphere or starts its turn there must succeed on a Strength save or take 2d6 Bludgeoning damage. You can use a Bonus Action to cause a bolt of lightning to leap from the center toward a creature within 60 feet, dealing 4d6 Lightning damage on a hit.
spells.at_higher_levels: The Bludgeoning and Lightning damage both increase by 1d6 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Summon Aberration
spells.material: a pickled tentacle and an eyeball in a platinum-inlaid vial worth 400+ GP
spells.description: You call forth an aberrant spirit from the Far Realm. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Aberrant Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose the creature's form: Beholderkin, Slaad, or Star Spawn.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 4th, AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 10, and damage increases by 1d8.

spells.name: Summon Construct
spells.material: an ornate stone and metal lockbox worth 400+ GP
spells.description: You call forth the spirit of a construct. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Construct Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose the creature's material: Clay, Metal, or Stone.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 4th, AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 15, and damage increases by 1d8.

spells.name: Summon Elemental
spells.material: air, a pebble, ash, and water inside a gold-inlaid vial worth 400+ GP
spells.description: You call forth an elemental spirit. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Elemental Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose an element: Air, Earth, Fire, or Water.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 4th, AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 10, and damage increases by 1d10.

spells.name: Summon Greater Demon
spells.material: a vial of blood from a humanoid killed within the past 24 hours
spells.description: You utter foul words, summoning one demon from the chaos of the Abyss. You choose the demon's type, which must be of Challenge Rating 5 or lower. The demon appears in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The demon is hostile to all creatures. At the end of each of the demon's turns, it makes a Charisma saving throw to attempt to break free of your control.
spells.at_higher_levels: The demon's maximum Challenge Rating increases by 1 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Vitriolic Sphere
spells.description: You point at a location within range, and a glowing 1-foot-diameter ball of emerald acid streaks there and explodes in a 20-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10d4 Acid damage and 5d4 Acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
spells.at_higher_levels: The initial damage increases by 2d4 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. The wall can be up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick (or a ring up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, 1 foot thick). When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Dexterity save, taking 5d8 Fire damage on a failed save, or half on a success. One side of the wall, selected by you, deals 5d8 Fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

spells.name: Watery Sphere
spells.description: You conjure up a sphere of water with a 5-foot radius at a point you can see within range. The sphere can hover but no more than 10 feet off the ground. Any creature in the sphere's space must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is Restrained by the sphere. You can move the sphere up to 30 feet as an action.
